room_title: Escape room "Houdini’s Final Escape Room" by Legends of Xscape in West Palm Beach
review: We have done three rooms here and always have a great time! We did the Houdini room tonight and it was pretty challenging but lots of fun. Alex was an awesome guide and super sweet. Will definitely be back again!

room_title: Escape room "Houdini’s Final Escape Room" by Legends of Xscape in West Palm Beach
review: I'm so glad I chose Legends of Xscape for my first escape room experience. My friends and I (group of 5) went on a Friday afternoon and chose the Houdini room (level 9/10). Despite being a beginner, the room was a perfect balance of challenging and fun. Our game master was Savannah, and she was so sweet and assisted us as needed. 10/10 would come back, especially to try the Area 51 room.

room_title: Escape room "Houdini’s Final Escape Room" by Legends of Xscape in West Palm Beach
review: Had so much fun. First time escapee! My first time was spent in the Houdini room. Lot of challenges. Friendly staff. I just can't wait to do it again!
